document_data.caption: Luna shapechanging into a silver dragon.
document_data.name: Shapechange
document_data.Effects: A powerful variant of the [[polymorph]] family, it changed the user's shape into any creature, and allowed him/her to change frequently.
document_data.History: The spell was attributed to [[Netherese arcanist]] [[Stoca]] in {{Yearlink|-1798}} and was originally called '''''Stoca's change shape'''''.
document_data.Notable Uses: During the [[Time of Troubles]] of the [[1358 DR|Year of Shadows, 1358 DR]], a brainwashed [[Luna]] used ''shapechange'' to turn into a [[silver dragon]] and attacked her friends [[Vajra Valmeyjar]], [[Kyriani Agrivar]], [[Onyx the Invincible]], and [[Timoth Eyesbright]]. However, the spell did not last long, and she quickly reverted to [[human]] form.{{Cite comic/Total Eclipse|2-4}}
